attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Will the government please consider the removal of the road fund license now that the taxation on fuel has been inflation linked? This will of course remove a great deal of revenue from the governments bank account but realising that there is no road fund license to enforce will surely reap financial benefits.

It will free up a great deal of wasted police time allowing the police to spend more time focusing on anti social problems.

It will also negate the government’s expenditure on advertising and enforcement.
